title: LOGIN PROBLEMS PLEASE HELP
body: I am trying to login into LOL but something go wrong I don't know what it says "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again if this issue persists contact support". I entered username and password that are true no mistake and won't login. Please help me I don't know that to do, thank you in advance. (sry for my bad English I am from Serbia)

replies.body: Having same issue in NA. Seems a lot of people are having issues this patch with this authenticating stuff. I've been working with Riot support for 4 days now and still having fixed the issue, including uninstalling and reinstalling it more than 3 times already. I have a feeling that until Riot figures out this issue on their end, we wont be able to play until next patch, which ultimately sucks, as my birthday was a few days ago, and I just got new champs for it, which I cannot even play.

It looks like everything is alright as far as your account goes, so this might be more of a case where your network is having problems getting a solid connection with our login servers. We should be able to get you back on the Rift by adjusting some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but let me know if that doesn't seem to help!
The past couple of weeks we here in Bulgaria have had huge issues with the game and today i can't even log in due to this error.
I'm having the same issue and used the hextech repair tool did a full repair but nothing helped. EUNE from Greece.
